name: NPR
text:
Inspired by her family, a high school senior has created a tool that predicts crop harvests to help reduce food insecurity.

"I have watched my younger siblings struggle with the lifelong effects of malnutrition," she says.
https://t.co/EZrdNnFUmw

name: NPR
text:
In his plan to address racial inequity, Joe Biden is proposing that the Federal Reserve refocus its attention onto America's significant racial economic gaps — and make sure the Fed regularly talks about those disparities.
https://t.co/5zVzJ2R4l5

name: NPR
text:
Cuba has opened stores for shoppers with U.S. dollars and dropped a tax on dollar transactions.

The government is trying to pull the country out of a deep economic slump — made worse by the pandemic.
https://t.co/yAcrEsSKIe
